'''Radiant Spincrystal 127''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Faded Banquet]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on the remains of a broken bridge in the {{Location|Faded Castle: Upper Level}}.
